  * Schools & Departments


## Departments
School
Course No.
A-Z
## Schools & Departments
  * [School of Architecture and Planning](https://sap.mit.edu/)
    * [ Architecture 4 ](https://architecture.mit.edu/)
    * [ Media Arts and Sciences MAS ](https://www.media.mit.edu/)
    * [ Urban Studies and Planning 11 ](https://dusp.mit.edu/)
  * [School of Engineering](https://engineering.mit.edu/)
    * [ Aeronautics and Astronautics 16 ](http://aeroastro.mit.edu/)
    * [ Biological Engineering 20 ](https://be.mit.edu/)
    * [ Chemical Engineering 10 ](https://cheme.mit.edu/)
    * [ Civil and Environmental Engineering 1 ](https://cee.mit.edu/)
    * [ Electrical Engineering and Computer Science 6 ](https://www.eecs.mit.edu/)
    * [ Health Sciences and Technology HST ](https://hst.mit.edu)
    * [ Materials Science and Engineering 3 ](https://dmse.mit.edu/)
    * [ Mechanical Engineering 2 ](http://meche.mit.edu/)
    * [ Nuclear Science and Engineering 22 ](http://web.mit.edu/nse/)
  * [School of Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences](https://shass.mit.edu/)
    * [ Anthropology 21A ](http://anthropology.mit.edu/)
    * [ Comparative Media Studies/Writing CMS/21W ](https://cmsw.mit.edu/)
    * [ Economics 14 ](http://economics.mit.edu/)
    * [ Global Languages 21G ](https://mitgsl.mit.edu/)
    * [ History 21H ](http://history.mit.edu/)
    * [ Humanities 21 ](http://catalog.mit.edu/interdisciplinary/undergraduate-programs/degrees/humanities/)
    * [ Humanities + Engineering/Science 21E/21S ](https://shass.mit.edu/undergraduate/joint)
    * [ Linguistics 24 ](http://linguistics.mit.edu/)
    * [ Literature 21L ](https://lit.mit.edu/)
    * [ Music and Theater Arts 21M ](https://mta.mit.edu/)
    * [ Philosophy 24 ](http://web.mit.edu/philosophy/)
    * [ Political Science 17 ](https://polisci.mit.edu/)
    * [ Science, Technology, and Society STS ](http://sts-program.mit.edu/)
  * [Sloan School of Management](http://mitsloan.mit.edu/)
    * [ Management 15 ](https://mitsloan.mit.edu/undergrad#15-1-management)
  * [School of Science](https://science.mit.edu)
    * [ Biology 7 ](https://biology.mit.edu/)
    * [ Brain and Cognitive Sciences 9 ](https://bcs.mit.edu/)
    * [ Chemistry 5 ](http://chemistry.mit.edu/)
    * [ Earth, Atmospheric, and Planetary Sciences 12 ](https://eapsweb.mit.edu/)
    * [ Mathematics 18 ](https://math.mit.edu/)
    * [ Physics 8 ](http://web.mit.edu/physics/)
  * [MIT Schwarzman College of Computing](http://computing.mit.edu/)
    * [ Data, Systems, and Society IDS ](https://idss.mit.edu/)
    * [ Electrical Engineering and Computer Science 6 ](https://www.eecs.mit.edu/)


## Schools
  * [ School of Architecture and Planning  ![Thumbnail of School of Architecture and Planning](https://www.mit.edu/files/images/2018-03/architecture.jpg) ](https://sap.mit.edu/)
  * [ School of Engineering  ![Thumbnail of School of Engineering](https://www.mit.edu/files/images/2018-03/engineering.jpg) ](https://engineering.mit.edu/)
  * [ School of Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences  ![Thumbnail of School of Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences](https://www.mit.edu/files/images/2018-03/humanities.jpg) ](https://shass.mit.edu/)
  * [ Sloan School of Management  ![Thumbnail of Sloan School of Management](https://www.mit.edu/files/images/2018-03/sloan.jpg) ](http://mitsloan.mit.edu/)
  * [ School of Science  ![Thumbnail of School of Science](https://www.mit.edu/files/images/2018-03/science.jpg) ](https://science.mit.edu)
  * [ MIT Schwarzman College of Computing  ](http://computing.mit.edu/)
